name: gypsophila
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a plant with many small white or pink flowers: White gypsophila is popularly used as a wedding flower. Gypsophila plants produce abundant sprays of tiny delicate flowers on long stems.
Goldfinch4ever/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesGypsophila can be combined in a bouquet with almost any type of flower.Here is a guide to growing beautiful gypsophila in your garden.I love the graceful appearance of gypsophila.Gypsophila is a genus of flowering plants in the carnation family.
